lead_paragraph: Mr. Johnson, head of the Investor Protection Bureau, was involved in some of the largest settlements with banks over misdeeds in the mortgage market.
snippet: Mr. Johnson, head of the Investor Protection Bureau, was involved in some of the largest settlements with banks over misdeeds in the mortgage market.

headline.main: Chad Johnson of New York Attorney General’s Office Moves to Private Practice
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Enforcer Is Leaving Government

abstract: New York State Investor Protection Bureau chief Chad Johnson is leaving to join Quinn Emanuel Urquhart & Sullivan; he served almost four years as top lieutenant to Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman.
